author: Hatalmas
title: Great versatile set
review:
This was one of the first Lego sets we got, it had a lot of building potentional and gave us countless hours of fun. Now as a father of a 4yo boy, I still find the big yellow panels useful when my son demands fast construction of a house or a garage :)

Pros

  • Lots of bricks to play with
  • Easy to handle and (rebuild) figures
  • Still useful bricks

Cons

  • Compared to today's shiny specialized bricks, it lacks detail
  • If not for the nostalgic value, I wouldn't buy it as of today, but since it's a '78 set I guess nobody buys it to play with :)
